body.csl:
print data = range(0, @{sub(length(variables('blobs')), 1)})
| mv-expand data
| sample @{triggerBody()?['sampleSize']}
| summarize make_list(data)

compose-batching-query.inputs:
let contentLengthThreshold = @{parameters('defaultContentLengthThreshold')};
let data = dynamic(
@{variables('remains')}
);
print data=data
| mv-expand data
| evaluate bag_unpack(data)
| mv-expand blobs
| evaluate bag_unpack(blobs)
| serialize
| extend newCreationTime = (creationTime != prev(creationTime))
| extend groupSum = row_cumsum(contentLength, newCreationTime)
| extend partOfBatch = (groupSum<=contentLengthThreshold or newCreationTime)
| extend p = pack("name", name, "contentLength", contentLength)
| summarize blobs=make_list(p) by creationTime, partOfBatch
| extend p = pack("creationTime", creationTime, "blobs", blobs)
| summarize list=make_list(p) by partOfBatch
| extend p = pack(iif(partOfBatch, "newBatches", "remains"), list)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p)
